Rover’s Socket API

This page documents ApolloTV’s specific implementation of Rover Socket Protocol (RSP) in Rover. This does not detail any of the advantages of RSP and only refers to RSP in the context of implementation. You should check the page for RSP for more information about the protocol.

Authentication

Rover is maintained by ApolloTVofficial. If you've spotted a mistake or would like to add to the documentation, you can submit a pull request.
